name: Dungeons And Caves (Dizabanik Games)
description:
WASD or ARROWS to WALK

Left Mouse click to SHOOT

Right Mouse click to ROLL

E to interact(pickup, go to hole)

Destroy all monsters on the location and find the hole in ground, press E and go to next location

The game has bugs, it's a fact, but still, the game was made in 3 days).

At the moment, there are 5 locations.

Each location is randomly generated, so it will be interesting for you to play the game several times. When a player spawns at a location, bugs sometimes appear (the player can spawn in the wall or behind the location zone. In this case, press the Tab button, the location will reboot. And so, now I will describe the locations and the mobs in them ...

1st location - Desert:

 1) Small worm - the weakest mob, can be killed with one

     a shot of any weapon, the speed is slightly slower than the player.

     Drop: no

 2) A huge worm is a mob that can only be found in

     desert. After killing, creates 5 small worms, when

     this can drop USP-S, cartridges or a healer.

 3) Sniper - the first mob-shooter which you will meet in the game.

     Has a low rate of fire, but strong damage. Drops

     USP-S, healers and cartridges.

2nd location - Caves:

 1) The mouse is a copy of a small worm, but faster.

 2) Sniper

 3) Reptile is a fast mob, with medium HP and strong damage.

3rd location - Deep Caves:

 1) Mouse

 2) Aligator - a more dangerous copy of a sniper, with a high

     rate of fire and damage, but less accurate.

 3) Infernal Pig King - like Aligator, rate of fire

     more, less damage.

 4) Sunken Captain - has a low rate of fire, but

 very high hp and bullets recochet.

4th location - Crystal Caves:

 1) Mouse

 2) Aligator

 3) Sunken Captain

 4) Crystal Knight is a slow melee mob with the most

 high HP in the game and average damage

 5) Aggressive knight - a mob with low health and speed,

 but as soon as he sees the player, he jumps to him and inflicts a large

 damage if the player does not move at this moment.

5th location - Underground Dungeon:

 1) Goblin - a faster copy of the mouse

 2) Speed slime - the fastest mob in the game, has,

 accordingly, very high speed and low hp, damage.

 3) Golden Knight - a mob that has a minigun in its arsenal, has

 high health, high rate of fire and does not walk, but

 stands still.

I really hope you enjoy the game and write a comment and rate it. Anyway, good luck with your walkthrough)
